compareTo(SongTemplate) - Method in class SongTemplate

matches(int, String) - Method in class SongTemplate
Matches this song against a given title, artist or genre, depending on the given match mode, which may be as a substring or exact.
MP3Player - Class in <Unnamed>
Class to provide a threaded MP3 Player, together with a basic end-of-play listener utilising the JLayer MP3 player from javazoom.
MP3Player() - Constructor for class MP3Player
Creates an MP3 player

P

play(String) - Method in class MP3Player
Starts playing the audio file obtained at string url in a separate thread and returns.
playFinished() - Method in interface PlayFinishedListener
Invoked on the listener object when a song is stopped or ends.
PlayFinishedListener - Interface in <Unnamed>
Interface to allow a user of MP3Player to listen for end-of-play.

Allows listener to be set to monitor end of playback.
setSortMode(int) - Static method in class SongTemplate

SongTemplate - Class in <Unnamed>
Partially completed class to represent a song for the Song Database.
SongTemplate() - Constructor for class SongTemplate
 
stop() - Method in class MP3Player
This method should be used to stop a currently playing audio track.

T

ToggleList - Class in <Unnamed>
An extension of JList giving `toggling' selection of items displayed in the list.
ToggleList() - Constructor for class ToggleList
 

U

USE_ARTIST - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: use artist
Match: use substring of artist field
USE_EXACT_ARTIST - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: not used
Match: use exact match with artist field
USE_EXACT_GENRE - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: not used
Match: use exact match with genre field
USE_EXACT_TITLE - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: not used
Match: use exact match with title field
USE_GENRE - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: use genre field
Match: use substring of genre field
USE_TIMES_PLAYED - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: use times played field
Match: use substring of times played field
USE_TITLE - Static variable in class SongTemplate
Sort: use title field
Match: use substring of title field
